thing-type.label: Energy Switch
thing-type.description: This Thing defines a KNX switch actor with energy management features

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The individual address in area.line.device notation

parameter.name: switchGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to toggle the switch

parameter.name: statusGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the switch status

parameter.name: operatingGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the number of hours the switch is in the switched on position

parameter.name: currentGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the current flowing through the switch or socket

parameter.name: energyGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the energy consumption throug the switch or socket

parameter.name: read
parameter.label: Read
parameter.description: Flag to indicate if group addresses should be read at startup

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Interval between attempts to read the group addresses on the bus, in seconds

channel-type.label: Input/Output Channel
channel-type.description: The channel to toggle the switch

channel-type.label: Input/Output Channel
channel-type.description: The channel to read the electric current

channel-type.label: Input/Output Channel
channel-type.description: The channel to read energy consumption
